name: The Eye of Mortis
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It decreases the users charisma unbelievably much.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration magnificently.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'willpower'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dark ritual'.
